Author: Mr.Phonomania
Title: [ANN] [ICO] BAANX - The Cryptobank Revolution
Body: So you are planning to issue banking licenses in the field of crypto-currency? Are they already confirmed by someone?

Author: Baanx.com Cryptobank
Title: [ANN] [ICO] BAANX - The Cryptobank Revolution
Body: Hi, to answer your question - we have an FCA License in the UK for a business already in the lending sector - however we are currently in application journey within the EU (2 countries in particular).  So not issuing licenses - but "sharing" within our rule based platform. We are working towards sharing using smart contracts, currently we are allowing the re-branding of Baanx.com services and their release to a new Cryptobank brands customer followers / supporters.  There are a lot of things in development and in process at Baanx - and we are looking forward to releasing our "shared license" model - which will allow a large Cryptobank network of startup Cryptobanks *(in the names of established brands with existing customers to market to) very quickly (instead of each startup needing $20m and lengthy application process).  Result = fast growth of Cryptobank market to rival Traditional Bank sector = protection of Fiat to Crypto supply = using known brands increase rapid uptake of Cryptocurrency usage in the everyday and within Cryptobanks.

Author: Mr.Phonomania
Title: [ANN] [ICO] BAANX - The Cryptobank Revolution
Body: It turns out that this will be similar to the model of franchising, only in the banking sector? Do you give a brand and a platform and many different entrepreneurs develop it?

Author: Baanx.com Cryptobank
Title: [ANN] [ICO] BAANX - The Cryptobank Revolution
Body: There are similarities to this, I agree.  Main differences though are that: 1) Baanx.com Platform and system manages back office and customer support through automation and AI (robo-advisors provided by 3rd party tech partner) 2) Baanx.com system manages all Cryptobank operations within the system in phase 1 - as because of licensing regs you need to maintain control of the Cryptobank operations. 3) As new Baanx.com Cryptobank brands grow they can (at critical mass) break away from the automated system and (if they wish) actually run with their own license to have greater control over the operational elements of the Cryptobank. 4) You don't "buy in" as we are choosing Brands and Social / Charities who have strong brand followings - Baanx.com is running an ICO to make this almost free to manage - they then market to their customer followings.  So in short Baanx.com platform manages the Cryptobank for them - the Brands are marketing it - until they get their own licenses and are big enough - then they can have much greater input into more variables as we release smart contract based elements in v2.
